author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1084: Separates api from portal ui scripts. jetui-portal.js is a YUI module which can be used anywhere, while portal.js is script codes using the library.
Now, other j2-admin portlets can import the library explicitly with YUI.
Also, global configuration object was renamed after the YUI convention.

author: oltka
msg: * ComponentGeometry switched to Java preferences API

author: jukka
